1: <pb/><t>Aretak quebenwil</t> <t>tak ri c'ache'laj</t> <t>quinc'ot nu chi':</t> <t>“¿jawije' lo quel wi na ulok</t> <t>ri to'l wech?”</t>
2: <t>Ri to'l wech quel na ulok</t> <t>ruc' ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri xbanow ri caj xukuje' ri ulew.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Mawi jubik' cuya' chi catjiljobic.</t> <t>Mawi jubik' cäwar ta na ri catchajinic.</t>
4: <t>Man c'o ta jubik' cäwaric;</t> <t>mawi jubik' cäwar ri cachajin ri Israel.</t>
5: <t>Ri Ajawaxel are' catchajinic;</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel are' catch'ukuwic,</t> <t>are' ri c'o chanakaj che a to'ic.</t>
6: <t>Ri k'ij man cuban ta c'ax chawe</t> <t>pa k'ij,</t> <t>mawi ri ic' cuban ta c'ax chawe</t> <t>chak'ab.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Ri Ajawaxel catuch'uk na</t> <t>rech man catkaj ta</t> <t>pa u k'ab apachique c'axc'olil;</t> <t>ri are' cuchajij ri a c'aslemal.</t>
8: <t>Ri Ajawaxel cuchajij na ri awelic bic</t> <t>xukuje' ri awoquic,</t> <t>kas camic c'a chbe k'ij sak.</t>
